entry.string: Xaraya is now at Production Stable. If you notice any unexpected functionality, please use our bug tracker at http://bugs.xaraya.com. Thank you for your support, and feel free to join our development or user discussions to become involved in our community.
For more information on Xaraya, please visit xaraya.com.
entry.translation: Para obter maiores informações sobre o Xaraya, visite o site xaraya.com.

entry.string: This message can be edited by creating an override template ( themes/themename/modules/base/user-main.xt ) for the base module.
